videopoker

Interface VideoPokerType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VideoPokerType107DB

    public interface VideoPokerType
    interface that allows the user to implement the methods to define the video poker type. One can implement strategies, ways to evaluate an hand and the amounts for the payouts.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String evaluateHand(Hand hand)
      This method allows user to implement its own way to evaluate a given hand according to the type of poker played
      int[] getAdvice(Hand hand)
      This method allows user to implement its own way of checking the best strategy to play a given hand.
      int getPayout(java.lang.String handtype, int bet)
      This method allows user to implement its own payout values according to the type of videopoker played.
      Statistics initStatistics()
      This method allows user to initialize a statistics structure as he/she wishes.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateHand

        java.lang.String evaluateHand(Hand hand)
        This method allows user to implement its own way to evaluate a given hand according to the type of poker played
        Parameters:
        hand - hand to be evaluated
        Returns:
        handtype type of the hand being analyzed

      • getPayout

        int getPayout(java.lang.String handtype,
              int bet)
        This method allows user to implement its own payout values according to the type of videopoker played. Given a hand type and a bet this method returns the correspondent payout
        Parameters:
        handtype - type of the hand being analyzed
        bet - amount of money that the player is betting
        Returns:
        payout payout resulting of the pair bet-handtype

      • getAdvice

        int[] getAdvice(Hand hand)
        This method allows user to implement its own way of checking the best strategy to play a given hand. Returns an array with the positions that are advised to hold
        Parameters:
        hand - hand to be analyzed
        Returns:
        positions array with the positions of the cards in the hand that are advised to hold

      • initStatistics

        Statistics initStatistics()
        This method allows user to initialize a statistics structure as he/she wishes. An object of type Statistics is returned
        Returns:
        statistic object of type Statistics initialized
        See Also:
        videopoker.Statistics.java
